resources.string: Eng : you go Kan : neenu HOGU(singular), neevu HOGI(plural)
Eng : that is for you Kan : adu NINAGE(singular), adu NIMAGE(plural)
Eng : this is yours\nKan : idu NINNADU(singular), idu NIMMADU(plural)
Eng : you go there\nKan : NEENU(singular) allige hogu, NEEVU(plural) allige HOGI
Eng : you come Kan : neenu BAA(singular), neevu BANNI(plural)
Please take a moment to appreciate our efforts.
Would you mind letting your friends know about the app?

"This feature helps you learn most frequently used verbs in kannada and it's tenses. 

How to use?
Just click on the "CLICK HERE" button and voila! you will be shown a new verb with it's past, present and future tenses. 
Click on any of the cards to listen to the audio message!

\t Software Engineer by profession, classical musician by passion. She would love to dance and play sports! Listen to her voice as owner in owner-maid conversations.
\tSoftware Engineer by profession, adventurist by passion! Listen to his voice as conductor, vendor etc under conversations.

Hey, 
I was trying to finish quiz in "Learn Kannada - Smartapp" but got stuck here. Would you mind helping me out? 

Btw, it is very easy to learn spoken Kannada using this app. I recommend you also to try this. 

Download it here:
 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=app.learnkannada.com.learnkannadakannadakali 

Watch Trailer here: 
 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wIE1qeBaUAQ
Not bad! \nBut, you can do better…
Congratulations!!\nYou aced it like a pro!

Welcome to Instant Word Translation✌

 -- Wondering who is this IWT? Well, Let me introduce myself.
 -- I am here to help you in translating any English Word to Kannada and also any Kannada word to English.
 -- Use that tiny switch below to select mode from English to Kannada or Kannada to English.
 -- I would also speak it out loud for you, so that you get to know the pronunciation.
 -- Not to forget, If you are a non-VIP, I will consume one "KK Coin" for every word I translate for you!
 
Because… that's food for me! ☺
 -- If you are a VIP, I translate unlimited words for FREE 
Happy 'IWT'ing :)

Welcome to Instant Word Translation -- Wondering who is this IWT? Well, Let me introduce myself
 -- I am here to help you in translating any English Word to Kannada and also any Kannada word to English
 -- Use that tiny switch below to select mode from English to Kannada or Kannada to English.
 -- I would also speak it out loud for you, so that you get to know the pronunciation
 -- Not to forget, If you are a non-VIP, I will consume one "KK Coin" for every word I translate for you
 -- Because… 
that's food for me!
 See you around. Bye bye! -- If you are a VIP, I translated unlimited words for FREE 
Happy 'IWT'ing

Welcome to Sample Conversations

 -- The category has sample conversation on a particular context
 -- Every sentence in the conversation has translation to Kannada, Kannada script and also audio message for better knowing the pronunciation
 -- If you are a non-VIP, each conversation would cost you 5 "KK Coins"
 -- If you are a VIP, you get UNLIMITED conversations for FREE. -- You can earn or buy KK Coins to fill up your Coins treasury
Thanks for the purchase. You will soon receive a receipt on your registered email ID.
Learn number of words everyday with each having audio, example and an option to validate your pronunciation!
Enjoy learning at your own pace!
Not a timeline person? We got you covered. Learn everything from alphabet to conversations at your own pace!
Once you feel confident enough, you can take our specially designed quizzes under 3 levels of difficulties!
Get instant translation from English to Kannada or vice-versa with audio message in just a click!
Hey, Welcome to Learn Kannada - Smartapp
Time to learn your first word in Kannada
Cool \nNow it\'s your turn to try it!
Congratulations!! \nYou just learned your first word in Kannada!

You have successfully learned all the available verbs. \n\nStay tuned for more!
All the verbs written here are with respect to \"First Person\" only.\nThey get changed a little for Second and Third person (coming soon).

Welcome to Bookmarking feature.

Here is how it works 
-- You can tap on the empty star icon to bookmark any word you like and tap on the icon again to remove bookmark. 
-- If you are a non-VIP, every bookmark will cost you 1 'KK Coin' 
-- If you are a VIP, you get UNLIMITED Bookmarks for FREE. 

Happy Bookmarking!

Welcome to Playlist Feature. Here is how it works

 -- Tapping on the Play button starts the auto-play of all the words in the list
 -- The word currently being played will be highlighted so that you do not lose track
 -- The page will be auto-scrolled. You can just sit-back and relax!
 -- Using this feature will cost you %d 'KK Coins' once per list/page
 -- Lifetime FREE for VIP members.

 The first time is absolutely FREE for non-VIP members!!

Welcome to Quizzes. I understand that you are excited to test yourself!
 Before that, let me tell you few things

 -- Each level has 10 sets of quizzes
 -- Each set has 10 MCQ Questions
 -- If you are a non-VIP, each set of quiz costs you 10 KK Coins
 -- If you are a VIP, you get UNLIMITED quizzes for FREE
 -- You will get your deducted coins back if you score 100%


Happy Quizzing... :)
You cannot proceed without completing Level %s

There are three levels of difficulty in Quizzes.
 
1. Easy 
2. Intermediate 
3. Difficult 
 
-- Each level has got 10 sets of questions with 10 questions in each set. 
-- If you are a non-VIP, you require at-least 10 KK coins to take an easy set, 12 to take an intermediate set and 15 to take a difficult set. 
-- If you are a VIP, you get UNLIMITED quizzes under all levels. 
-- The questions might ask you to translate any word to kannada or the vice-versa and you should choose the right answer among the given four options. 
-- Higher the difficulty, tougher will be the translation of words/sentences. 
--On completion of each set with score more than threshold, you will be able to click on share icon to generate and share your certificate. 
-- You will not be able to attend higher levels of quizzes without finishing the lower level.

Please note that each question is for 1 mark and there will be 10 questions in each set. -- You should score minimum 50% to pass the test and you will never be allowed to try new set otherwise. -- If you score above 50% and below 100%, you can retry any number of time to achieve higher scores -- You should also be able to review your answers at the end, only if you score above 50%.

Don\'t have time for too many words? We got your back! Learn a word with pronunciation everyday, through our daily word notifcations
Consonants without diatric gets combined with vowels/diatric to form consonants with diatric.
Diatric can be referred as an accent. Adding a diatric to any consonant will change the way it is pronounced.

Consonant gets combined with one or more consonants to form compound letters. Below example explains how n(ನ್), n(ನ್) and a(ಅ) gets combined to form nna(ನ್ನ), a compound letter in the word \'kannaDa(ಕನ್ನಡ)\'
Based on whether the consonant gets combined with the same consonant or a different consonant, compound letters are classified into two.
sajaati means \"of same type / same caste \". If a consonant gets combined with the same type of consonant, then it is referred as \'sajaati samyuktakshara\'\nFor example,
ka(ಕ) + n(ನ್) + n(ನ್) + a(ಅ) + Da(ಡ)\n = \n kannaDa (ಕ ನ್ನ ಡ)
vijaati means \"of different type / different caste \". If a consonant gets combined with a different type of consonant, then it is referred as \'vijaati samyuktakshara\'\nFor example,
shu(ಶು) + k(ಕ್) + r(ರ್) + a(ಅ) + vaara(ವಾರ)\n = \n shukravaara (ಶು ಕ್ರ ವಾರ)
It looks like you are offline. Please connect to internet to enjoy this section
-- Always try to translate given English sentences to your mother tongue first and then to Kannada. \n\n--This helps you understand and learn Kannada faster!

Don't worry! Continue reading to understand error messages.

 1. Error: No ads at the moment. Please try again/later.
 Reasons:
 + -- Our ads provider might not be handling your region yet
 -- There might be no ads in the inventory to display

 2. Error: You can watch only %d times in %d minutes.
 Reasons:
 -- %d is the limit number of times you can watch ad in %d minutes. Try after sometime to watch ad again.

-- This is a FREE app.
 -- "10 Days Course" has been designed to help people learn "Basic Spoken Kannada". This does not guarantee the complete learning of Kannada language.
 -- Translations given at some places in the app are not in pure Kannada.
 -- We have used English words at many places to keep the learning simple and appealing. This attempt should not be mistaken as disrespect to Kannada language.
 -- Individual names used in the app are used for illustration purposes ONLY. If anybody's name is matching with the names used in the app, it's purely coincidental.
 -- HithAM Creations is not responsible for any damage caused due to misuse of this application. The app is published for the sole purpose of helping people learn spoken Kannada only."

-- Kannada Kali app is being developed by "HithAM Creations", a team of two passionate developers.
 -- The app is exclusively developed for people who want to learn "Spoken Kannada" on the go.
 -- We are working really hard to add more and more exciting features to the app.
 -- We request all the users to spend some time on the app and let us know your expectations.
 -- Please help us improve this app by providing your valuable suggestions."
